channel.title: I CAN'T ADD EXTRA CAPTIONS TO GAME - GAME ISSUES
channel.description:
Black Mesa workers aren't add Turkish Captions to game so we made a Turkish caption for Black Mesa but i cant add it on game. How can we add our captions to game ?
Sorry if i opened the entry on wrong subject. I just registered a few minutes ago.
